ygData.subject: rune Location on Erollisi Marr
ygData.msgSnippet: There s a Rune of Flauntal ( Or something like that was late last night when I seen it) at the Armor Shop in East Free port on erollisi Marr for anybody that
ygData.messageBody:
There's a Rune of Flauntal ( Or something like that was late last night
when I seen it) at the Armor Shop in East Free port on erollisi Marr for
anybody that needs it or wants it it sells for 4 plat ( yes it was down
at the bottom) Never had the cash on me and had to catch the boat.

--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"But I've always been a Loner by Nature
and A Lurker by Want"

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

-----------------------------------------------------------
